sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCYTAL1A, in botany: A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the octandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking with thoſe that are doubtful. The calyx is very ſhort, monophyllous, and ſomewhat quinquedentated; tire corolla pentapetalous; the filaments hairy at the baſe; the berry unilocular, with one ſeed of a ſoft pulpy conſiſtence. There is only one ſpecies, viz. the Sinensis, a native of the Eaſt Indies.
